# Changelog

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

The format is based on [Keep a Changelog](https://keepachangelog.com/en/1.0.0/),
and this project adheres to [Semantic Versioning](https://semver.org/spec/v2.0.0.html).

## [0.1.0] - 2024-12-30

### Added
- Initial release of Halo MCP Server
- Complete Halo blog management functionality through MCP
- 30+ tools for posts, categories, tags, and attachments management
- 10 intelligent writing assistant prompts
- Support for Markdown content creation and editing
- File upload and attachment management
- Category and tag management
- Draft and publish workflow
- Comprehensive documentation and examples

### Features
- **Post Management**: Create, edit, publish, delete posts
- **Category Management**: Create, update, delete categories
- **Tag Management**: Create, update, delete tags  
- **Attachment Management**: Upload files, manage attachments
- **AI Writing Assistants**: 10 specialized prompts for content creation
- **MCP Integration**: Full compatibility with Claude Desktop and other MCP clients

### Technical
- Python 3.10+ support
- Async/await architecture
- Type hints throughout
- Comprehensive error handling
- Extensive test coverage
- Development tools integration (black, isort, mypy, ruff)
